MatrixMachine.Relationship: P1 * MLEN * BLEN * (FP_EXP_WIDTH + FP_MANT_WIDTH + 1) + P2 * MLEN * BLEN * (WT_MX_MANT_WIDTH + WT_MX_EXP_WIDTH + 1 + MX_SCALE_WIDTH) + P3 * (MLEN // BLOCK_DIM) * BLEN * (BLOCK_DIM * ACT_ELEMENT_WIDTH + MX_SCALE_WIDTH) + P4 * MLEN * (FP_EXP_WIDTH + FP_MANT_WIDTH + 1) + P5

MatrixSRAM.Relationship: P1 * MLEN * (WT_MX_EXP_WIDTH + WT_MX_MANT_WIDTH + 1 + MX_SCALE_WIDTH) * MATRIX_SRAM_DEPTH + P2

ScalarMachine.Relationship: P1 * (FP_EXP_WIDTH + FP_MANT_WIDTH + 1) + P2 * INT_DATA_WIDTH + P3 * INT_SRAM_DEPTH * INT_DATA_WIDTH + P4 * FP_SRAM_DEPTH * (FP_EXP_WIDTH + FP_MANT_WIDTH + 1) + P5

HBMSystem.Relationship: P1 * HBM_ELE_WIDTH + P2 * HBM_SCALE_WIDTH + P3 * (MLEN // BLOCK_DIM) * (BLOCK_DIM * (WT_MX_MANT_WIDTH + WT_MX_EXP_WIDTH + 1) + MX_SCALE_WIDTH) + P4 * (MLEN // BLOCK_DIM) * (BLOCK_DIM * KV_ELEMENT_WIDTH + MX_SCALE_WIDTH) + P5 * (MLEN // BLOCK_DIM) * BLEN * (BLOCK_DIM * ACT_ELEMENT_WIDTH + MX_SCALE_WIDTH) + P6
